actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain additional aircraft museums from Federal fuel taxes and the Federal tax on the use of civil aircraft.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt government chartered air museums operated exclusively for the care or use of antique, custom-built, racing, military or other special types of aircraft from the excise taxes on special fuels and the use of civil aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain additional aircraft museums from Federal fuel taxes and the Federal tax on the use of civil aircraft.
